import React,{useEffect}from'react';import{useDispatch}from'react-redux';import{Redirect,Link}from'react-router-dom';import'../styles/DashboardCard.css';import{setIsLoading}from'../actions/isLoading';import{deletePost}from'../actions/dashboardPosts';import{setCurrentId}from'../actions/currentId';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var DashbordCard=function DashbordCard(_ref){var post=_ref.post;var dispatch=useDispatch();useEffect(function(){dispatch(setIsLoading(false));});var onDelete=function onDelete(){var condition=window.confirm("Do you want to delete the Post?");if(condition){dispatch(deletePost(post._id));}};var onEdit=function onEdit(){dispatch(setCurrentId(post._id));// return <Redirect to='markdownform' />
};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"dashboard-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"dash-title",children:post.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"dash-delete-btn",onClick:onDelete,children:"Delete"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"dashboard/markdownform",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"dash-edit-btn",onClick:onEdit,children:"Edit"})})]});};export default DashbordCard;
